Posts.Content: Hi Kathie and other ladies, I believe that is the web address that you are trying to get. Also there is wonderful breast cancer support group. Go to www.bcsupport.org then make sure you scroll down for General board, Recurrence board, Chemo Board and chat room and so on. If you are her-2 positive, go to www.her-2support.org you will find lots of info and support. Best wishes to all of you. Meiris
Posts.Title: Stage 4 breast cancer, need help
